name: Standard Salary Slip 1

html:
Experience Letter

Date: {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(frappe.utils.nowdate()) }}

To whom it may concern,

This is to certify that {{ doc.employee_name }} (Emp ID: {{ doc.name }}) was employed with {{ frappe.db.get_single_value('Global Defaults','default_company') }} from {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.date_of_joining) }} to {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.relieving_date or frappe.utils.nowdate()) }} as {{ doc.designation or 'Employee' }}.

During the tenure, {{ doc.employee_name.split(' ')[0] }} performed duties to our satisfaction.

We wish {{ doc.employee_name.split(' ')[0] }} all the best for future endeavors.


Authorized Signatory
name: Experience Letter
